conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: I'm just so tired of trying. Nothing seems to work no matter how hard I push.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: You're feeling exhausted and hopeless right now.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: It seems like you've been putting in so much effort without seeing the results you want, and that's really discouraging.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: Yeah, exactly. I don't know what to do anymore. I feel stuck.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: Have you tried exercising in the morning?

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: You should probably make a schedule to get organized.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: I have a schedule, but I just can't stick to it. I lose motivation.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: So you have the tools, but the drive to use them fades away when things get tough.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: I guess so. I just want to be happy again.
